title: PaginationTitles Props
description:
Properties to customize various pagination titles. The following properties should be
passed into the pagination component's title property.

currPageAriaLabel.description: Accessible label for the input displaying the current page.

items.description: The type or title of the items being paginated.

itemsPerPage.description: The title of the pagination options menu.

optionsToggleAriaLabel.description: Accessible label for the options toggle.

page.description: The title of a page displayed beside the page number.

pages.description: The title of a page displayed beside the page number (plural form).

paginationAriaLabel.description: Accessible label for the pagination component.

perPageSuffix.description: The suffix to be displayed after each option on the options menu dropdown.

toFirstPageAriaLabel.description: Accessible label for the button which moves to the first page.

toLastPageAriaLabel.description: Accessible label for the button which moves to the last page.

toNextPageAriaLabel.description: Accessible label for the button which moves to the next page.

toPreviousPageAriaLabel.description: Accessible label for the button which moves to the previous page.
